function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low usage of non-contact medical services","Impact":"Inefficient response to contagious diseases and increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize the use of non-contact medical services through education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, online appointment systems","People":"Residents, elderly individuals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, local government"},{"Description":"Limited impact of online medical services","Impact":"Inadequate reduction in offline medical facility usage, leading to potential overcrowding","Mitigation":"Improve the quality and accessibility of online medical services to encourage greater adoption","Technologies":"Healthcare apps, remote monitoring devices","People":"Residents, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Substitution effect on medical and health service allocation","Impact":"Disruption in the allocation of medical resources and services in the community","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive impact assessments and adjust resource allocation strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Data analytics, community health management software","People":"Community health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"}]}
